author: cms-tsg-storm
body:
This PR is an update of the HLT menu.
The main reason is to include DeepCSV in HLTDebug event content (see #23513 and CMSHLT-1905).
This will restore the release validation plots for b-tagging @ HLT

Based on CMSSW_10_2_X_2018-06-10-2300
title: Include DeepCSV in HLTDebug event content (update HLT menu)
